name: 東方海星 touhoukaisen
description:
The faries are building an oni sandcastle! Help Cirno smash seashells to get bombs so she can put a stop to their plans.

Once the faries are finished building the sandcastle and it is chasing after you, you'll need to use your bombs to blow it apart. Keep on looking for seashells to help you build bombs.

--

Windows users run touhoukaisei.exe
Linux, MacOS users run love touhoukaisei.love

-- 

Keyboard Controls:
W,S,A,D: Move
J,K,L,I: Shoot
Space: Bomb
Q: Return to Menu
P: Pause
Esc: Quit to Desktop

Pad Controls (XBox):
D-Pad, Left Stick: Move
Face Buttons, Right Stick: Shoot
Left, Right Bumper: Bomb
Select: Return to menu
Start: Pause

--

T. Boddy: engine programming, art, music, sfx, etc...
Made in 74 hours for Touhou Station Game Jam (japan)
